CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name, 'Block', IF(ISBLANK( animalos__Sitename__c), Name, animalos__Parent_Block__r.Name & ' / ' & Name), 'Unit', IF(ISBLANK( animalos__Sitename__c), animalos__Parent_Block__r.Name & ' / ' & Name, animalos__Parent_Block__r.animalos__Parent_Block__r.Name & ' / ' & animalos__Parent_Block__r.Name & ' / ' & Name), 'Site', Name, 'Foster', Name, 'Offsite', Name, NULL)
CustomField.label: Full Location Name
